# GitHub Configuration

GitHub-specific configuration for the radioastronomyio website repository.

## Contents

| Directory | Purpose |
|-----------|---------|
| [`workflows/`](workflows/) | GitHub Actions workflows (Azure Static Web Apps deployment) |

## Setup

The Azure Static Web Apps deployment workflow will be auto-generated when:

1. Azure Static Web App is created in Azure Portal
2. This repository is linked as the source
3. Azure pushes the workflow file automatically

No manual configuration required.
